text: Local elections were held in Cebu City on May 14, 2001 within the Philippine general election. Registered voters of the city elected candidates for the following elective local posts: mayor, vice mayor, district representative, and eight councilors at-large for each district. There are two legislative districts in the city. ==Mayoralty and Vice Mayoralty Elections== ===Mayor=== ===Vice Mayor=== ==District Representatives== ===1st District=== ===2nd District=== ==References== Category:2001 Philippine general election Category:Elections in Cebu City
title: 2001 Cebu City local elections
